The Oregon Health Authority on Sunday reported 332 new confirmed or presumptive cases of the coronavirus and two more deaths.

articles.title: Here’s one ‘remarkable’ difference between COVID-19 and the 1918 Spanish flu - MarketWatch
articles.description: There are also similarities between the 1918 influenza and SARS-CoV-2, the coronavirus that originated in Wuhan, China
articles.content: The 2020 coronavirus and 1918 Spanish influenza pandemics share many similarities, but they also diverge on one key point.A major difference between Spanish flu and COVID-19 is the age distribution o… [+5664 chars]
